feat.@value: he saw his way of life
“Is it nothing that you see from your God?”
He said, that is the priest:
“Us, it is small liturgies that we do
and the mysteries are revealed to us
and you, you do these toils of this sort, these nights of vigilance and these asceticisms and this silence,
‘we don’t have any thought that’s wicked in our heart’,
and still (there is?) that which separates you from your God,
as he doesn’t reveal his mysteries to you.”
And after they heard, that is the elders, they were amazed
“The thoughts that are wicked truly have always separated us from God.”
